text: Peat-Bog Soldiers () is a 1938 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Macheret.«Болотные солдаты» (1938)Болотные солдаты (1938) It stars Oleg Zhakov, S. Shirokova, and Ivan Kudryavtsev. == Actors == * Oleg Zhakov as Paul * S. Shirokova as Marie * Ivan Kudryavtsev as Tiedemann * Aleksandr Zrazhevsky as Bischoff * Vasili Vanin as The Camp Commander == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Macheret
title: Peat-Bog Soldiers
